document.full_text: microsoft is still not too late for the tablet party. and with its next operating system closer than most expect, the software maker could corner meaningful market share in 2013 and beyond, citigroup said.
document.title: microsoft not too late for tablet party: citigroup
lines_and_colors: microsoft is still not too late for the tablet party. and with its next operating system closer than most expect, the software maker could corner meaningful market share in 2013 and beyond, citigroup said.
